game.name: Boogie Bashers
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: It's time to party like there’s no tomorrow. Dance in the spotlight and push others out of it in this goofy, 5 player party game. Steal power ups, avoid hazards, and outsmart your opponents to get more shine than everyone else.
game.shortDescriptionEn: It's time to party like there’s no tomorrow. Dance in the spotlight and push others out of it in this goofy, 5 player party game. Steal power ups, avoid hazards, and outsmart your opponents to get more shine than everyone else.
